name: Sheep Golf
description:
This is a game where you golf sheep into their pens, some sheep may need to go into a different pen to other sheep for some reason.

Only control to play is the mouse, hold left click to charge your dog and aim with the cursor. Release left click to send your dog loose.

Also press "R" to restart a level and press "ESC" to return to menu.

Now go golf them sheep!
